feed.title: Track Awesome Django Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome things related to Django

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 17, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • impostor (⭐160) - Impostor is a Django application which allows staff members to log in as a different user by using their own username and password.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • django-removals (⭐63) - Detect deprecated settings variables via convenient system checks
  • django-classy-settings (⭐37) - Class-based settings to keep your environments in order, with easy access to typed environment variables.

Third-Party Packages / Editors

  • django-prose (⭐214) - A lightweight editor for content creation.

Third-Party Packages / Forms

  • django-formtools (⭐850) - For form previous and multistep forms, previously part of Django until 1.8.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-treenode (⭐758) - Abstract model/admin for tree-based stuff.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • django-celery-results (⭐742) - Celery result backend with Django.
  • django-tasks (⭐612) - A reference implementation and backport of background workers and tasks in Django, based on DEP 14.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-allauth-ui (⭐342) - Better-looking templates for django-allauth.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • django-docker-template (⭐217) - Dockerized Django with Postgres, Gunicorn, and Traefik (with auto-renew Let's Encrypt).
  • wemake-django-template (⭐2.1k) - Bleeding-edge Django template focused on code quality and security.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • linkding (⭐8.6k) - Self-hosted bookmark manager that is designed to be minimal, fast, and easy to set up using Docker.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 15, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-hijack (⭐1.6k) - Admins can log in and work on behalf of other users without having to know their credentials.

Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-jet-reboot (⭐471) - Django Jet is modern template for Django admin interface with improved functionality.

Third-Party Packages / APIs

  • dj-rest-auth (⭐1.8k) - Authentication for Django Rest Framework.
  • django-rest-knox (⭐1.2k) - Authentication Module for django-rest-auth.
  • django-rest-framework-simplejwt (⭐4.2k) - JSON web tokens for DRF.
  • django-webpack-loader (⭐2.5k) - Transparently use webpack with Django.

Third-Party Packages / Commands

  • django-click (⭐278) - Write Django management commands using the click CLI library.
  • django-dbbackup (⭐1.1k) - Management commands to help backup and restore your project database and media files.
  • django-typer (⭐211) - Write Django management commands using the Typer CLI library.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • django-split-settings (⭐1.2k) - Organize multiple settings files.

Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

  • django-cms (⭐10k) - CMS for Django.

Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

  • saleor (⭐22k) - GraphQL-based Django E-Commerce Platform.

Third-Party Packages / Editors

  • django-markdownx (⭐910) - Comprehensive Markdown plugin built for Django.
  • django-summernote (⭐1.1k) - Summernote is a simple WYSIWYG editor.

Third-Party Packages / General

  • django-sql-explorer (⭐2.8k) - Share data via SQL queries.

Third-Party Packages / Logging

  • django-guid (⭐465) - Inject a GUID (Correlation-ID) into every log message in a Django request.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-polymorphic (⭐1.7k) - Django-polymorphic simplifies using inherited models in Django projects.
  • django-recurrence (⭐517) - Utility for working with recurring dates in Django.

Third-Party Packages / Security

  • django-feature-policy (⭐107) - Set the draft security HTTP header Feature-Policy on a Django app.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • django-redis (⭐3k) - Full-featured Redis cache backend for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Templates

  • django-components (⭐1.4k) - A way to create simple reusable template components in Django.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • django-debug-toolbar (⭐8.3k) - Configurable panels to debug requests/responses.
  • django-waffle (⭐1.2k) - A feature flipper for Django.

Third-Party Packages / URLs

  • dj-database-url (⭐1.5k) - Database URLs.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-improved-user (⭐154) - A custom Django user that authenticates via email. Follows identity and authentication best practices.

Third-Party Packages / Views

  • django-vanilla-views (⭐985) - Simpler class-based views in Django.

Python Packages / Views

  • python-decouple (⭐2.9k) - Strict separation of settings from code.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • cookiecutter-django (⭐13k) - A full-bodied starter project, highly customizable.
  • djangox (⭐2.4k) - Batteries included starter project for Pip, Pipenv, or Docker.
  • Falco (⭐387) - Enhance your Django developer experience: CLI and Guides for the Modern Django Developer.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 07, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-admin-inline-paginator-plus (⭐58) - A simple way to paginate your inline in Django admin

Third-Party Packages / General

  • iommi (⭐913) - Toolkit for development of CRUD applications without writing HTML or JavaScript.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 05, 2025
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Django for APIs, Fifth Edition
  • Django for Beginners, Fifth Edition

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jan 23, 2025
entry.content:
Resources / Podcasts

  • Django Brew - A fun, caffeine-powered podcast about the Django web framework by Adam Hill and Sangeeta Jadoonanan!

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jan 06, 2025
entry.content:
Projects / Open Source Projects

  • Django CRM Admin (⭐319) - Open source Python CRM built entirely on Django Admin Site.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jan 04, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-admin-dracula (⭐51) - 🦇 Dracula themes for the Django admin.

Resources / Educational

  • Photon Designer - Django tutorials - Django tutorials by Tom Dekan on how to build Django apps simply - from how to build an instant messenger with Django, add instant search, to using Google Drive as a database. Updated regularly.

Resources / Job Boards

  • Django Gigs - This platform caters specifically to freelance and full-time Django developers.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • Blaze.horse (⭐43) - A Django starter kit with reins and saddle included!

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Dec 29, 2024
entry.content:
Projects / Open Source Projects

  • Baserow - Open source no-code database and Airtable alternative built with Django and Vue.js.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Dec 08, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-related-admin (⭐71) - A helper library that allows you to write list_displays across foreign key relationships.
  • django-admin-sortable2 (⭐843) - Generic drag-and-drop ordering for objects in the Django admin interface.

Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-grappelli (⭐3.9k) - A jazzy skin for the admin.
  • django-jazzmin (⭐1.8k) - Drop-in theme for django admin, that utilises AdminLTE 3 & Bootstrap 4 to make yo' admin look jazzy.
  • django-daisy (⭐257) - A modern django dashboard fully responsive built with daisyui.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • django-zeal (⭐145) - Detect N+1 queries with user-friendly error messages

Third-Party Packages / Templates

  • htpy - htpy is a library that makes writing HTML in plain Python fun and efficient, without a template language.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Oct 25, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-unfold (⭐2.7k) - Modern Django admin theme for seamless interface development.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • django-content-settings - Easily create and manage editable typed variables directly from the Django admin panel.

Third-Party Packages / General

  • Django-Classy-Doc (⭐43) - Document your own code in the style of CCBV and CDRF.

Third-Party Packages / Mailing

  • django-anymail (⭐1.8k) - Django email backends and webhooks for Amazon SES, Brevo (Sendinblue), MailerSend, Mailgun, Mailjet, Postmark, Postal, Resend, SendGrid, SparkPost, Unisender Go and more.

Resources / Community

  • Local Django Communities Page - Featuring local events all around the world.
  • X (formerly Twitter) - For official announcements on updates, security fixes, etc.

Resources / Videos

  • DjangoTV - Your source for Django conference videos and tutorials.
  • PyVideo - PyVideo is an index of Python related media.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • OpenContracts (⭐888) - Enterprise-grade document analytics platform that combines automated PDF parsing, vector embeddings, and LLM integration.

  • Django Day Copenhagen (YouTube Channel)

entry.content:

entry.content:

  • django-cotton - Goodbye {% raw %}{%{% endraw %} extends, block, include {% raw %}%}{% endraw %}, Hello <c-component />. Bringing modern UI composition to Django.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 28, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Monitoring

  • django-prometheus (⭐1.6k) - Export Django monitoring metrics to Prometheus.
  • django-mixin (⭐64) - Monitoring mixin for Django-prometheus. A set of Grafana dashboards and Prometheus rules for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • django-q2 (⭐495) - A multiprocessing distributed task queue for Django.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Feb 08, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Internationalisation (i18n)

  • django-localflavor (⭐882) - A collection of functionality that is useful for particular countries or cultures. Previously a part of the Django core.
  • django-modeltrans (⭐71) - Translate Django model fields in a JSONField.
  • django-modeltranslations (⭐1.4k) - Translates Django models using a registration approach.
  • django-rosetta (⭐1.1k) - Rosetta provides a UI to read and write your project's gettext catalogs within the Django Admin.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jan 22, 2024
entry.content:

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Nov 17, 2023
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Templates

  • curlylint - Experimental HTML templates linting for Jinja, Nunjucks, Django templates, Twig, Liquid.
  • django-template-partials (⭐579) - Reusable named inline partials for the Django Template Language.
  • djhtml (⭐607) - Django/Jinja template indenter.
  • djlint - Lint & Format HTML Templates.
  • slippers - Build reusable components in Django without writing a single line of Python.
  • JinjaX - Super components powers for your Jinja templates.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • storybook-django (⭐114) - Develop Django UI components in isolation, with Storybook.

Resources / Community

  • Mastodon - For official announcements on updates, security fixes, etc.

Resources / Job Boards

  • Django News Jobs - A Django job board that also aggregates other job boards.
  • Django Jobs - Django jobs posting for hiring Django Python developers.
  • Python.org Job Boards - While not exclusively for Django, this job board is hosted by the official Python website and features a range of Python and Django-related job opportunities.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Feb 07, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Nov 12, 2022
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Model Fields

  • django-any-urlfield (⭐51) - An improved URL selector to choose between internal models and external URLs.
  • django-colorfield (⭐654) - Color field for django models with a nice color-picker widget.
  • django-streamfield (⭐128) - Simple StreamField for plain Django admin (based on Wagtail CMS StreamField idea).

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-lifecycle (⭐1.4k) - Declarative model lifecycle hooks, an alternative to Signals.
  • django-mptt (⭐2.9k) - Modified Preorder Tree Traversal; working with trees of Model instances.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • pyinstrument (⭐7.2k) - Call stack profiler for Python, Django, Flask, FastAPI.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • django-fakery (⭐114) - An easy-to-use implementation of Creation Methods for Django, backed by Faker.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Oct 05, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Oct 02, 2020
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / APIs

  • django-tastypie (⭐3.9k) - Creating delicious APIs for Django apps since 2010.

Third-Party Packages / Views

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jul 29, 2020
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / APIs

  • django-rest-framework (⭐29k) - Web APIs for Django.
  • django-cors-headers (⭐5.5k) - If your back-end and front-end are on different servers, you need this.
  • djoser (⭐2.7k) - REST implementation of Django auth.
  • djaq (⭐80) - An instant remote API to Django models with a powerful query language.
  • drf-yasg (⭐3.5k) - Automated generation of real Swagger/OpenAPI 2.0 schemas from Django REST Framework code.
  • graphene-django (⭐4.4k) - GraphQL for Django.

entry.content:
Resources / Educational

  • Django Girls Tutorial - Use function-based views to build a blog app.
  • LearnDjango - Tutorials and premium courses on Django and Django REST Framework.
  • TestDriven - Multiple Django-specific tutorials on topics like Docker, payments, and more.
  • Django Styleguide (⭐5.6k) - Styleguide for Django with best practices and examples.

Resources / Podcasts

  • Running in Production - Focused on tech stacks with many episodes specifically on Django.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jul 04, 2020
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-import-export (⭐3.2k) - Django application and library for importing and exporting data with admin integration.
  • django-loginas (⭐370) - "Log in as user" for the Django admin.

Third-Party Packages / Async

  • channels (⭐6.3k) - Async support for Django.
  • starlette (⭐11k) - ASGI framework.

Third-Party Packages / Commands

  • django-extensions (⭐6.7k) - Custom management extensions, notably runserver_plus and shell_plus.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • confidential (⭐76) - Manage configs and secrets (with CLI support).
  • django-environ (⭐3.1k) - Environment variables.
  • django-constance (⭐1.8k) - A Django app for storing dynamic settings in pluggable backends (Redis and Django model backend built in) with an integration with the Django admin app.

Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

  • mezzanine (⭐4.8k) - CMS framework.
  • puput (⭐654) - Blog app features with Wagtail.

Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

  • django-shop (⭐3.3k) - Django-based shop system.
  • shuup (⭐2.3k) - Django E-Commerce Platform.
  • django-oscar (⭐6.4k) - Domain-driven e-commerce for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Files/Images

  • django-cleanup (⭐1.2k) - Zero configuration file/image removal for local and remote files.

Third-Party Packages / Forms

  • django-crispy-forms (⭐5.1k) - DRY Django forms.
  • django-widget-tweaks (⭐2.1k) - Tweak form field rendering in templates.
  • django-autocomplete-light (⭐1.8k) - Add autocompletion to forms.

Third-Party Packages / Model Fields

  • django-model-utils (⭐2.7k) - Django model mixins and utilities.
  • django-money (⭐1.7k) - Money fields for forms/models.
  • django-phonenumber-field (⭐1.5k) - Model/form field for normalized phone numbers.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-taggit (⭐3.4k) - Simple model tags.
  • django-reversion (⭐3.1k) - Version control for model instances.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • django-perf-rec - Keep detailed records of the performance of your Django code.
  • New Relic - Time middleware, views, and SQL queries.
  • django-query-profiler (⭐141) - Django query profiler to help resolve N+1 queries.
  • py-spy (⭐14k) - Sampling profiler for Python programs.

Third-Party Packages / Search

  • django-haystack (⭐3.7k) - Modular search for Django.
  • django-watson (⭐1.2k) - Full-text search plugin.

Third-Party Packages / Static Assets

  • django-storages (⭐2.9k) - A single library to support multiple custom storage backends for Django.
  • django-compressor (⭐2.8k) - Compress JavaScript/CSS into a single cached file.
  • easy-thumbnails (⭐1.4k) - Image thumbnails for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • beatserver (⭐142) - A periodic task scheduler for Django.
  • django-rq (⭐1.9k) - Integration for Redis Queue.
  • celery (⭐27k) - Robust and broker-agnostic task queues for bigger, performance-focused projects.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • pytest-django (⭐1.5k) - Use pytest features in Django.
  • django-test-migrations (⭐555) - Test django schema and data migrations, including migrations' order.
  • django-test-plus (⭐626) - Useful additions to Django's default TestCase.
  • factory-boy (⭐3.7k) - Test fixtures replacement.
  • model-bakery (⭐908) - Object factory for Django (rename of legacy Model Mommy project).

Third-Party Packages / URLs

  • urlman (⭐122) - A nicer way to do URLs for Django models.
  • django-robots (⭐474) - This is a basic Django application to manage robots.txt files following the robots exclusion protocol, complementing the Django Sitemap contrib app.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-allauth (⭐10k) - Improved user registration including social auth.
  • django-organizations (⭐1.3k) - Multi-user accounts for Django projects.
  • django-cas-ng (⭐390) - Django-cas-ng is Django CAS (Central Authentication Service) 1.0/2.0/3.0 client library to support SSO (Single Sign On) and Single Logout (SLO).

Third-Party Packages / Views

  • django-braces (⭐2k) - Reusable, generic mixins.
  • django-extra-views (⭐1.4k) - Extra class-based generic views.
  • django-stronghold (⭐399) - Makes all your Django views default login_required.

Python Packages / Views

  • bleach (⭐2.7k) - Sanitize your inputs/forms.
  • black (⭐40k) - Uncompromising Python code formatter.
  • coveragepy (⭐3.2k) - Code coverage measurement.
  • huey (⭐5.6k) - A little task queue for Python.
  • nplusone (⭐1k) - Auto-detect n+1 queries.
  • pillow (⭐13k) - Python Imaging Library.
  • pytest (⭐13k) - Testing framework.
  • python-slugify (⭐1.5k) - Returns unicode slugs.
  • sentry-python (⭐2k) - Error reporting SDK.

Resources / Official Resources

  • Documentation - Comprehensive documentation for all Django versions.
  • Polls Tutorial - Build a polls tutorial while learning Django internals.
  • Source Code (⭐84k) - Hosted on GitHub.

Resources / Community

  • IRC Channel - Chat with other Django users at irc://irc.freenode.net/django.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • sos-django-template (⭐24) - Django starter template with separate dev and production settings.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • pythonic-news (⭐537) - Hacker News clone.
  • Zulip (⭐23k) - Open-source team chat.
  • Django-CRM (⭐2.1k) - Open Source Python CRM based on Django.
  • django-job-portal (⭐603) - Job portal application using Django.
  • Built with Django - Curated list of awesome Django projects.

Wagtail / Wagtail Resources

  • Wagtail Source Code (⭐19k)
  • awesome-wagtail (⭐2.1k)
